Package main.itemsim

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SimilarityMeasure
    given two items and their feature vectors, calculate the similarity score of two items
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FindSimilarItem
    Given a keyword, this class will call the Ebay API, get a list of product items.
    Item
    The in-memory data structure for item class
    ItemFeature
    Given the Items, created its TFIDF vector representation using tokens from title and optionally other fields
    ItemLSHIndex
    Given a list of items, call ItemFeature class to obtain the feature vector representations for items, and build the super bits LSH over the feature vectors.
    LinearSimilarity
    compute the similarity of two items using a specific similarity metric: sim (i, j) = 0.5 * cosine(i,j) + 0.4 * jaccard(i,j) + 0.1 * simprice(i,j)
    ParseData
    parse the items from the returned JSON file
